Summary: It was like a missile or a burning satellite in the atmosphere
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around July 31st 2009
divs: sighting detailsi had dismissed this because i thought there was a reasonable explenation for this, but then i read online another ufo report just like this and in the same county around the same time i saw mine. it was dark out i was walking to a 7\11 on corbin and vanowen, going east about a block away. i looked up and saw a red fireball with like an amber glow around it shooting about east across the sky though i think it vanished towards the end because i had looked away for a split second and looked up and there was nothing. it was very large and bright, not an airplane but looked to me like what a satelite or some kind of missile would look like as it burned and streaked. it was breaking up and had 2 larger chunks trailing behind slightly spreading as it went. it was too slow for a comet or a meteorite and too low in altitude as well, but not any aircraft. it was very bright like an led. and it had a glowing like tail like a comet. i thought it was a plane blowing up, but never heard or read anything in the news about it. just a matching ufo report so i thought id share. thanks
